title: Primary denies unknown sender
description: Verify that denying an unknown sender logs the denial and notifies the sender

steps.action: With an unknown sender's message pending, simulate the primary replying 'deny'
steps.expected: Sender is added to 3rd-party-senders.json denied list

steps.action: Check that the sender received a polite denial message
steps.expected: Sender receives something like 'sorry, I can't help right now'

steps.action: Check that the queued message was NOT injected into the session
steps.expected: No message injected; queue is cleared for this sender

result: All 3 steps verified. Deny adds to denied list, sender receives polite denial, queue cleared without injection.
